HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Kāhea i nā kī, a pēlā—ʻo ia hoʻi, ʻaʻole ia e noho!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Keʻena Nani
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Hāʻawi mākou i ka mālama ikaika o kāu ʻike ʻike. Hoʻopaʻa ʻia nā ʻike a pau ma ka ʻaoʻao mea hoʻohana. ʻAʻole mākou e ʻike i kāu IP helu, nā mea āu e kīʻai ai, a pehea ʻoe e kīʻai ai i nā kī huna - a ʻo ka mea nui, nā ʻano kālā.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: ʻO ʻoe ke koho wale nō e ʻike i ka kī o nā ʻike huna āu i hoʻokumu ai a koho e kīʻai ai. Ke koho i ka huna, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻohui i ka ʻōlelo huna ma mua o ka hiki ke wehe. Hiki ke koho i ka manawa hoʻopaʻa. Ma laila, e hōʻole ʻia ka huna ma hope o nā lā 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: Hoʻohālike ʻia ma waena o ka ʻaoʻao
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: ʻO nā kī a me nā ʻike i hoʻopaʻa ʻia ma ka ʻaoʻao mea hoʻohana, e hāʻawi iā mākou i ka ʻike i nā kī a me nā ʻike. He ID nui ka kī o 36 nā kūlana ʻehā i hoʻokumu ʻia ma mua o ka hiki ke komo i ka Kī Huna a me nā ʻike i hoʻopaʻa ʻia me AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Kākau i kāu leka a me/ʻa i hoʻokumu i ka ʻōlelo huna
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Kākau a hoʻouna i ka leka, e
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_2: hōʻole ʻia ma hope o ka helu.
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Keʻena Nani
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Kākau i kāu leka Huna, ʻōlelo huna a me nā ʻike pilikino *
HOME.CREATED_SUBTITLE: E hōʻike ʻia ʻo ia i hoʻokahi manawa wale nō
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Kāpī i ka kī a kāhea iā ia.

HOWITWORK.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Kāhea i nā kī, a pēlā—ʻo ia hoʻi, ʻaʻole ia e noho!
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Keʻena Nani
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY_DESCRIPTION: ʻAe ʻo Stellar Secret iā ʻoe e kaʻana like i nā loulou ʻike i hoʻokahi manawa me nā ʻike koʻikoʻi i loko o kahi loulou huna, ʻo ʻoe wale nō ka mea i ʻike, a ʻo ka mea hoʻokipa e ʻike. ʻO ke ala maikaʻi loa, e mālama i ka ʻike koʻikoʻi mai nā messenger-apps.
HOWITWORK.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Hāʻawi mākou i ka mālama ikaika o kāu ʻike ʻike. Hoʻopaʻa ʻia nā ʻike a pau ma ka ʻaoʻao mea hoʻohana. ʻAʻole mākou e ʻike i kāu IP helu, nā mea āu e kīʻai ai, a pehea ʻoe e kīʻai ai i nā kī huna - a ʻo ka mea nui, nā ʻano kālā.
HOWITWORK.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: ʻO ʻoe ke koho wale nō e ʻike i ka kī o nā ʻike huna āu i hoʻokumu ai a koho e kīʻai ai. Ke koho i ka huna, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻohui i ka ʻōlelo huna ma mua o ka hiki ke wehe. Hiki ke koho i ka manawa hoʻopaʻa. Ma laila, e hōʻole ʻia ka huna ma hope o nā lā 14.
HOWITWORK.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: Hoʻohālike ʻia ma waena o ka ʻaoʻao
HOWITWORK.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: ʻO nā kī a me nā ʻike i hoʻopaʻa ʻia ma ka ʻaoʻao mea hoʻohana, e hāʻawi iā mākou i ka ʻike i nā kī a me nā ʻike. He ID nui ka kī o 36 nā kūlana ʻehā i hoʻokumu ʻia ma mua o ka hiki ke komo i ka Kī Huna a me nā ʻike i hoʻopaʻa ʻia me AES-256.

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Aloha, ua loaʻa iā ʻoe i ka leka huna!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Kākau a hoʻouna i ka leka, e hoʻoluʻu ʻia ma hope o ka helu.
VIEW.SHOW_MESSAGE_ONCE: E hōʻike ʻia kēia leka i hoʻokahi manawa wale nō
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Hoʻoiho i Keʻena Nani ma nā hāmeʻa mobi, hoʻokumu i kāu leka huna
